2.2.0.changelog:
* feat: added button to give item from vault
* feat: potion effects for tipped arrow (#59)
* feat: wrap and format SNBT text (#27)
* feat: Chinese translation (#53)
* fix: mod not working after changing dimensions
* fix: GUAPI screen handler not resetting correctly (#60)

2.1.2.changelog: * fix: bump forge version which should fix crash at startup

2.1.1.changelog:
* fix: error when trying to open the NBT editor for a block that doesn't have NBT data (#57)
* fix: letter added at the end of a formatted text input is not formatted when saving

2.1.0.changelog:
* Added Block Editor (not finished yet)
* Added Entity Editor (not finished yet)
* Added Vault: allows to save items and entities and re-use them between saves or servers (not finished yet)
* Added "Copy command" button
* Added buttons to switch between editors (standard, NBT, SNBT)
* Various fixes

2.0.10.changelog:
* Fixed an issue while editing an item from the creative survival inventory screen or from a chest
* Added automatic file upload to Modrinth

2.0.9.changelog:
* Fixed an issue with custom enchantments
* Fixed an issue with enchantments not being removed
* Disabled "reset" buttons when the value hasn't changed
* Added automatic file upload to Curseforge & GitHub

2.0.8.changelog: Added config option "permissionLevel", fixed a crash when opening the item editor from the survival inventory with the recipe book open

2.0.6.changelog: Fixed missing translated text in the attribute modifier operation tooltip, optimizations to improve editor loading time

2.0.5.changelog: Fixed a crash when opening the editor from the inventory in an obfuscated environment

2.0.4.changelog: Fixed a crash when opening the editor in an obfuscated environment while playing on a non-modded server

2.0.3.changelog: Fixed a crash when pressing IBE Editor keys in an inventory screen without hovering a slot

2.0.2.changelog: Fixed a crash when opening the player editor
